entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain then changing to periods of rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
